speaker: Verso
line: Can you stand? Monoco gets a bit carried away sometimes.

speaker: Maelle
line: My back hurts, but I’m fine.

speaker: Verso
line: Good. The others are probably heading toward the centre of the city. We’ll rejoin them there.

speaker: Noco
line: (gibberish) And find treasure along the way!

speaker: Maelle
line: Feels like home.

speaker: Verso
line: yeah, feels like home. You ok?

speaker: Maelle
line: Monoco fits well in the Disaster Expedition, eh?

speaker: Verso
line: Yeah, he does. After you.

speaker: Maelle
line: Speaking of home, where’d you live in Lumière?

speaker: Verso
line: Above a bakery near the centre. Um… Angelique’s Boulangerie! I ate there every morning. I wonder if it’s still there.

speaker: Maelle
line: It’s called “Mathilde”s” now. When this is over, you should go and visit.

speaker: Maelle
line: We’re a pretty good team. Verso? VERSO? Putain. What- Where did he go? Verso, where did you go… I need to find Lune and Sciel. Quickly.

speaker: Noco
line: (gibberish) Hihihi. I’m still here! Don’t worry, Verso runs off all the time. He’s always ditching me and Monoco. He’ll be back.

speaker: Verso
line: I knew you’d open the door for her. Merde.

speaker: Renoir
line: Really, Verso? This was your plan? How many times must you hurt our family.

speaker: Verso
line: No. No, you don’t get to lecture ME on family.

speaker: Renoir
line: Why do you refuse to see I am doing this for us? Yet you insist on rushing toward death. You’re trying to stop the wrong cycle.

speaker: Verso
line: You’re doing this for yourself.

speaker: Renoir
line: Of course, it’s easier for you to think that, isn’t it? Easier to betray us, if I’m the villain.

speaker: Maelle
line: Verso, move. I’m gonna fucking kill him.

speaker: Renoir
line: You haven’t told her the truth, have you, son?

speaker: Lune
line: Sorry, we’re late, we were busy doing a bit of reading. Were you planning on sharing that this man, the man who murdered our team, is your father?

speaker: Verso
line: Family is not my favourite topic. right, can we talk about this later? I’d really like for you all to survive this.
